name: Referential
description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc

api_methods.name: City by IP address (Geo IP)
api_methods.description: Find a city, state, country and continent by IP address. For some results, the closest result within 10 miles will be provided.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: ip4 pr ip6 formatted IP address

constraints.format: ip4 or ip6 formatted IP address

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [geonameid, timezone,state_code,iso_a2]

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the city and state for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
What is the location details for the IP 203.0.113.195 including the timezone?
Find the city and country for the IP address 198.51.100.1 and include the state code.
Where is the IP 203.0.113.0 located? Please include the geonameid.
Can you provide the city and continent for the IP address 192.0.2.1 and include the ISO A2 code?
What is the location of the IP 198.51.100.0? Include the timezone and state code.
Find the city and state for the IP address 203.0.113.1 and include the geonameid and ISO A2 code.
Can you tell me the city and country for the IP 192.0.2.0 and include the timezone and state code?
What is the location details for the IP address 198.51.100.2 including the geonameid and ISO A2 code?
Find the city and continent for the IP 203.0.113.2 and include the timezone and geonameid.

api_methods.name: Countries
api_methods.description: List or search countries of the world in different languages.. Get iso a2, a3 country code and localized country name

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Filter on currency name in chosen lang

parameters.name: dial_code
parameters.description: Filter on country dial code

parameters.name: currency_code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter currency code (ISO)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return for each country [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter iso country code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Country name search string. Can be partial contains...

parameters.name: continent_code
parameters.description: Two letter region/continent code (eu, na, sa, as, af, oc, an). Lookup at /v1/continent.

parameters.name: iso_a3
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter iso country code

parameters.name: currency_num_code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 digit numeric currency code (ISO)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

utterances.utterance: Which countries use the Euro as their currency?
Can you list countries in Asia with their dial codes?
Find countries that use the currency code USD.
Show me details about Canada including its ISO codes and currency.
What are the countries in Africa that use the currency with code 710?
List all countries in Spanish that are in the European Union.
Can you find the country with the dial code +1?
Show me the ISO A3 code for Australia.
What countries use the currency with the numeric code 978?
List all countries in French that are located in North America.

api_methods.name: Cities
api_methods.description: List and search over 75,000 world cities in 20 languages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results

parameters.name: state_hasc
parameters.description: Filter on state's HASC code. List at /v1/state.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Filter on timezone name. List at /v1/timezone.

parameters.name: geonameid
parameters.description: Filter on geonameid

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Search by names starting with prefix. See also limit, order and sort fields.

parameters.name: timezone_offset
parameters.description: Filter on timezone offset in hours

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort on field [population, state_code, name, timezone, state_hasc, iso_a2]. Please see limit and order fields.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search as \"contains\" on city name in chosen lang

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.description: Filter on state's ISO-3166-2 letter code. List at /v1/state

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc,geonameid]

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order [asc | desc]

utterances.utterance: Can you list cities in California sorted by population in descending order?
Show me cities in the Pacific timezone with a timezone offset of -8 hours.
Find cities in France that start with 'Par' and display their country code.
List cities in the state with HASC code 'US.TX' and sort them by name in ascending order.
Search for cities in Germany that contain 'Berlin' in their name.
Can you show me cities in the Eastern timezone with their state codes?
Find cities in Spain that start with 'Bar' and display their timezone information.
List cities in Italy sorted by state code in descending order.
Show me cities in the state with HASC code 'US.NY' and include their geonameid.
Find cities in Canada that are in the Mountain timezone and sort them by population.

api_methods.name: State
api_methods.description: List the sub-regions/states/provinces/departments of the world's countries

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: iso_3166_2
parameters.description: Filter on Subregion's ISO-3166-2 letter code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to select in the result [iso_a2]

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as \"contains\" on the states's name in chosen lang

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

Can you find the states in India with the code 'IN-KA'?
Show me the provinces in China that include 'Guang'.
List the states in Mexico.
What are the sub-regions in Germany with the code 'DE-BE'?
Can you list the states in Japan that contain 'Hokkaido'?

api_methods.name: Timezones
api_methods.description: List the world's time zones in 20 languages

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Filter on non daylights savings offset in hours

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on timezone name in chosen lang

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter non daylight savings timezone code (not unique)

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Filter on timezone name in english

parameters.name: daylights_offset
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings offset in hours

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: daylights_code
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings letter code (not unique)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [code,timezone,daylights_code,daylights_offset,daylights,hours_offset,offset]

parameters.name: daylights
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings/non daylight savings timezones (true,false)

utterances.utterance: What are the time zones with a daylight savings offset of 2 hours?
Can you list the time zones that include 'Eastern' in their name?
Show me the time zones for the code 'PST'.
What are the time zones in English that are in the 'America' region?
List the time zones with a daylight savings code 'D'.
Can you show me the time zones that do not observe daylight savings?
What are the time zones with an offset of -5 hours?
Show me the time zones in French that include 'Central' in their name.
List the time zones with a daylight savings offset of 1 hour and include only the code and timezone fields.

api_methods.name: City by id
api_methods.description: Direct lookup of over 75,000 cities by id. See the v1/city API to search for city ids.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Lookup at /v1/city.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc]

I need the timezone and state HASC for Duluth, Georgia.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2 letter iso language code to localize country name

api_methods.name: Continents

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on continent name in chosen lang
